sentences.english: This is where the smart copywriter becomes a marketer.
sentences.chinese: 這裏就需要體現營銷者比聰明的廣告文案高明之處了。

sentences.english: And I also thought that it just wasn’t my job to care about content.
sentences.chinese: 同樣地，我也曾經認爲網站文案與我無關。

sentences.english: Create benefit intensifiers for your list of ad copy benefits.
sentences.chinese: 建立利益強化的名單廣告文案的好處。

sentences.english: Do you or have you considered offering copywriting services to your clients?
sentences.chinese: 你曾經有沒或者考慮過向客戶銷售文案服務呢？

sentences.english: You put your copywriting partner in touch with your client and recommend their services.
sentences.chinese: 讓你的文案搭檔聯繫你的客戶並推薦他們的服務。

sentences.english: Private advisers in ancient times were people who helped officials deal with documents and letters.
sentences.chinese: 古時衙門裏的師爺是幫助官員做文案工作的人。

sentences.english: In advertising, we attach more importance to the performance of the text.
sentences.chinese: 在廣告方面，宣美更注重文案的表現力。

sentences.english: This essay is a study of the reiterative style in advertising copy.
sentences.chinese: 本文以廣告文案中的形式反覆現象爲研究對象。

sentences.english: There are many good copywriters that do not have the above skills.
sentences.chinese: 有很多很好的文案並不具備上述的技能。

sentences.english: Long work is what the lawyer who bills 14 hours a day filling in forms does.
sentences.chinese: 長時間工作是文案律師一天填14個小時的表格。

sentences.english: Then, they should produce a free proposal for your client.
sentences.chinese: 然後，文案爲你客戶給出一個免費的提案。

sentences.english: On most websites, more time is spent on copywriting than design.
sentences.chinese: 大多數的網站，時間更多的花費在文案而非設計。

sentences.english: We are in the bank with other goblins and doing a lot of paperwork.
sentences.chinese: 我們和其他妖精一起在古靈閣做一些文案的工作。

sentences.english: Official documents are no longer written on lambskin.
sentences.chinese: 現在已經不用羊皮紙書寫文案了。

definition: (publishing) (abbr. for 美術編輯|美术编辑[mei3 shu4 bian1 ji2]) layout and graphics/graphic design/art editor/graphic designer
tweet (on Twitter)/(HK, Tw) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/to reply to original poster (or recommend a post) on PTT bulletin board
(publishing) layout and graphics/graphic design/art editor/graphic designer
to plot/to scheme/to bring about/to engineer/planning/producer/planner
